attr.title: The Wind
attr.desc: The story of Lizzy, a tough and resourceful plainswoman, and her struggle against supernatural forces around her isolated home. It's a short retro-inspired pixel horror game based on THE WIND (2019) directed by Emma Tammi.
attr.inst: Download THEWIND_v1-0.zip free on itch.io (https://airdorf.itch.io/thewind), extract it, and copy THEWIND_v1-0.exe to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download *THEWIND\_v1-0.zip* free on itch.io (https://airdorf.itch.io/thewind), extract it, and copy *THEWIND\_v1-0.exe* to the port's *gamedata* folder.
